title: Short Ghost and Horror Collection 007
creator: Various
description: A collection of fifteen stories featuring ghoulies, ghosties, long-leggedy beasties and things that go bump in the night. Expect shivers up your spine, the stench of human flesh, and the occasional touch of wonder. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; ghost; horror
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
